thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Kelly

author: Kelly
title: Kelly
text: I have been super happy with TrustedHousesitters.com. As of this review, we have had 2 house sitters. Both times our dogs were well loved and fed. We have a very anxious dog and I was concerned about how successful she would be with a "stranger". Since the house sitters were dog lovers they quickly won her over. My house was always left in perfect condition and maybe a little better than the way we left it. I can't wait for our next trip! I feel so relieved that we now can get away more often and there will be wonderful people in our home to take care of our dogs!
